item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 27, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Read the Obits (66 points | 12 comments)
2. Did 5G Kill the IMSI Catcher? (58 points | 16 comments)
3. Show HN: I created snapDOM to capture DOM nodes as images with exceptional speed (32 points | 12 comments)
4. Reverse Geocoding Is Hard (106 points | 56 comments)
5. Libogc (Wii homebrew library) discovered to contain code stolen from RTEMS (53 points | 25 comments)
6. Shardines: SQLite3 Database-per-Tenant with ActiveRecord (151 points | 35 comments)
7. Watching 03 Model Sweat over a Paul Morphy Mate-in-2 (26 points | 8 comments)
8. Unlocking Ractors: Object_id (16 points | discuss)
9. Extend (YC W23) is hiring engineers to build LLM document processing ( | hide)
10. TmuxAI: AI-Powered, Non-Intrusive Terminal Assistant (28 points | 6 comments)
11. How NASA Is Using Graph Technology and LLMs to Build a People Knowledge Graph (58 points | 11 comments)
12. Show HN: A Common Lisp implementation in development, supports ASDF (49 points | 18 comments)
13. The Coming Knowledge-Work Supply-Chain Crisis (25 points | 5 comments)
14. Mesmerizing Interlocking Geometric Patterns Produced with Japanese Woodworking (85 points | 15 comments)
15. Show HN: Remote-Controlled IKEA Deathstar Lamp (218 points | 46 comments)
16. How to program a text adventure in C (181 points | 33 comments)
17. Calibrations Have a Context-Collapse Problem (14 points | 2 comments)
18. Open-source interactive C tutorial in the browser (208 points | 39 comments)
19. Wikipedia: Database Download (154 points | 68 comments)
20. Found a simple tool for database modeling: dbdiagram.io (189 points | 56 comments)
21. Icônes (244 points | 31 comments)
22. Show HN: My self-written hobby OS is finally running on my vintage IBM ThinkPad (519 points | 102 comments)
23. Bare metal printf – C standard library without OS (200 points | 67 comments)
24. We're building a dystopia just to make people click on ads [video] (153 points | 144 comments)
25. NASA's Lucy Spacecraft Completes Asteroid Donaldjohanson Flyby (11 points | discuss)
26. An end to all this prostate trouble? (734 points | 288 comments)
27. Show HN: Logchef – Schema-agnostic log viewer for ClickHouse (7 points | 2 comments)
28. Watching o3 guess a photo's location is surreal, dystopian and entertaining (919 points | 404 comments)
29. Sigbovik Conference Proceedings 2025 [pdf] (156 points | 20 comments)
30. Anatomy of a SQL Engine (139 points | 14 comments)
